article_title: Obamacare's Website Is Crashing Because Backend Was Doomed In The Requirements Stage

article_metadata.description: Healthcare.gov may require a complete re-architecting to overcome the data glitches and confront intramural conflicts sidestepped in the original requirements documents.
article_metadata.author: Anthony Wing Kosner
